details:
It was discovered that jupyter-core, the base framework for Jupyter projects
like Jupyter Notebooks, could execute arbitrary code when loading
configuration files.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
4.4.0-2+deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your jupyter-core packages.


For the detailed security status of jupyter-core please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/jupyter-core>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
